short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ezy Alarm Clock provides quick access to an alarm and world clock via a widget on your browser toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create alarms for important tasks or check international time on a world clock to easily plan travel or meetings across time zones. 

How to use the alarm and clock widget:
- Add the extension to your Chrome™ browser
- Pin the extension to your browser's toolbar for quick access to the alarm and clock widget
- To schedule an alarm, enter the alarm name and set the day and time
- View the time in your location on the ‘Clock’  tab. To check the time in another location, add a clock for that place or time zone

We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product.

Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this Chrome™ extension.
